sentence.Network_en: He was big - chested, big - shouldered and heavy - armed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他胸肌健硕, 肩膀宽厚,胳膊粗壮.

sentence.Network_en: Heavy armed soldiers were marching along the streets.
sentence.Network_cn: 带有重武器的士兵们在街上行走着.

sentence.Network_en: I don't want any more of that heavy stuff.
sentence.Network_cn: 我再也不想碰那种麻烦事了。
